'''''Minecraft: Essential Handbook''''' is a guide to various ''[[Minecraft]]'' mechanics and techniques written by [[Stephanie Milton]] with help by [[Paul Soares Jr.]] and [[CaptainSparklez|Jordan Maron ("CaptainSparklez")]] and first published in the United States by [[WP:Scholastic Corporation|Scholastic]] on November 26, 2013,<ref name="First US">{{Citation|url=https://www.amazon.com/dp/0545669936|title=Minecraft: Essential Handbook|website=[[WP:Amazon (company)|Amazon]]|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20151220065339/http://www.amazon.com/Minecraft-Essential-Handbook-Official-Mojang/dp/0545669936}}</ref> and in the United Kingdom by [[WP:Egmont Group|Egmont Books]] as '''''Minecraft: Beginner's Handbook''''' that same year.<ref name="First UK">{{Citation|url=https://www.amazon.com/dp/1405268395|title=Beginner's Handbook (Minecraft)|website=[[WP:Amazon (company)|Amazon]]|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20250331191841/https://www.amazon.com/dp/1405268395}}</ref> This was among the first books released for the game and also features an exclusive interview between [[Jens Bergensten]] and [[Markus Persson]].

An ''Updated Edition'' was released on July 28, 2015, which added information pertaining to the [[Bountiful Update]].<ref name="2nd US>{{Citation|url=https://www.amazon.com/dp/0545823269/|title=Minecraft: Essential Handbook (Updated Edition): An Official Mojang Book|website=[[WP:Amazon (company)|Amazon]]|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20220629085937/https://www.amazon.com/dp/0545823269}}</ref><ref name="2nd UK">{{Citation|url=https://www.amazon.com/dp/1405276770|title=Minecraft Beginner's Handbook|website=[[WP:Amazon (company)|Amazon]]|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20251024185714/https://www.amazon.com/dp/1405276770}} (''Updated Edition'')</ref>

== Synopsis ==
{{Quote|You're alone in a mysterious new world, full of hidden dangers. You have only minutes to find food and shelter before darkness falls and the monsters come looking for you.|Original description}}{{Quote|Revised edition with the most up to date stats, info, and sixteen pages of brand-new material!

You're alone in a mysterious new world, full of hidden dangers. You have only minutes to find food and shelter before darkness falls and the monsters come looking for you. What do you do?

This official handbook--now with sixteen additional pages of brand-new content--might just save your life. Learn how to find resources; make a shelter; craft tools, armor, and weapons; and protect yourself from monsters. With tips from Minecraft experts--including developer Jeb and creator Notch himself--this is the definitive guide to surviving your first few days in Minecraft.|Updated description}}

== Contents ==
There are two types of pages within the book. The majority of the book are tutorials on various features of ''Minecraft'', but occasionally there are editorials with stylized graphics on out-of-game subject matter.
